title: England and Wales fertility rate hits record low
description: Last year’s total fertility rate of 1.41 was lowest since comparable data was first collected in 1938, ONS says
content:
The fertility rate for England and Wales has fallen for the third year in a row to reach a record low, figures show.
The total fertility rate across both nations, meaning the average number of live children women can expect to have across their child... [4064 chars]

title: Girl who stabbed teachers in Welsh school had been considered for Prevent
description: Multi-agency report says girl, 13, had fascination with Hitler, weapons and claimed to speak German and Russian
content:
A teenager who was interested in Adolf Hitler had been considered for referral to the anti-terror programme Prevent before she stabbed three people at her school, a report has revealed.
The 13-year-old had a curiosity for war memorabilia and the Nazi... [5096 chars]

title: Paul Gallagher, older brother of Oasis stars Liam and Noel, appears in court charged with rape
description: During a five-minute hearing at Westminster Magistrates' Court, Paul Gallagher spoke to confirm his name, age and address, but entered no pleas.
content:
Paul Gallagher, the older brother of Oasis stars Noel and Liam, has appeared in court charged with rape, sexual assault and other offences.
